Articles.Content:
Drinking coffe with hope that 1.0 will be released in a few minutes, but also with understanding that now we are at T minus 4-6 hours.

Oh, that's my first message here. Quite senseless, but i just can't stay quiet (and work too).
![32174.JPG](http://www.ar15.com/media/mediaFiles/16335/32174.JPG)

> 
> I'll give the current time in my/SQUAD's timezone:
> 07:36 AM

Brb, prepping coffee for teleporting to Squad HQ.

> 
> Did anyone else notice that there were no "Day 2" or "Day 1" feature videos?

Yup! I think the preview vids and stream covered days 1&2

> 
> I think I have a problem, I may or may not be at a stoplight on my way to work.

"Checking for the KSP 1.0 release is something not to do at a stoplight!"
Is this the hype train/rocket?

> 
> "Checking for the KSP 1.0 release is something not to do at a stoplight!"

Hence the problem, Siri helped me!

I have three long lights on my way to work.
Bedtime here, but if I check my phone and see 1.0 is out before I get to sleep I may just have to get up again.
I think it Will release around 19:00 CEST. Steam games tend to release then.

> 
> Is this the hype train/rocket?

No, this is Patrick.

> 
> Is this the hype train/rocket?

Yes! and welcome to the forums, RaV3D!

Happy landings!

Almost there!!!

![scYYP81.png](http://i.imgur.com/scYYP81.png)
Is this the krusty kraken?

This last week I haven't been able to play because by the time my career save would get loaded I had convinced myself that even if the game save didn't get broken enough of the game will change that I might as well start over
Server migration image is back!

> 
> Server migration image is back!

Same here.

Good morning ppl. 

No release just yet I guess.

> 
> Server migration image is back!

All I see is text.

Happy landings!
I hope it releases soon. It's a national holiday here in the Netherlands so I could give my Monday afternoon all to KSP.
Hype! I have owned this game three years and have spent 500+ hours on it. It never gets old. Thank you SQUAD!

> 
> is this the krusty kraken?

no, this is patrick!
hype hype hypE!!!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> no, this is patrick!

Jeb's not here, man.
Within the next 2 and a half hours i expect!!

> 
> All I see is text.
> Happy landings!

What kind of weird joo joo are they running that my phone gets the image and my computer gets text?
